value.query: SELECT id, name, %vlocity_namespace%__RecurringTotal__c, AccountId, Product2.Family, Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__SubType__c FROM Asset WHERE Product2.Family = 'Mobile' AND Product2.%vlocity_namespace%__SubType__c = 'Offer' AND AccountId = '{{$root.currentUser.Account.attributes.url.substring(38)}}' LIMIT 1
